overview:
Wessel Kooyman is an entrepreneur who has founded Cole Street Consulting, a web development company. He has lived in Amsterdam, San Francisco, Bucharest, and is currently living in Paris.

With a technical background as a Web Developer, Wessel Kooyman was in San Francisco from 1998 to 2006, and was in the heart of the Dot Com boom and bust.

During the Dot Com boom, he consulted for numerous startups at acting CTO. During the bust, he worked as a Web Developer, and founded Cole Street Consulting in 2003 in San Francisco.

In 2008 he rebooted Cole Street Consulting as an innovative web development company based out of Paris and Bucharest, with business partner Quentin Jonas.
